text: Alexandra Ruth Shipp (born July 16, 1991) is an American actress, singer- songwriter and musician. She is known for playing singer Aaliyah in the Lifetime television movie Aaliyah: The Princess of R&B; (2014) and Kimberly Woodruff in the Oscar-nominated movie Straight Outta Compton (2015). Shipp is best known for playing Storm in the X-Men franchise, starting with X-Men: Apocalypse, and Abby Suso in the 2018 romantic comedy Love, Simon. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Musicians from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Writers from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Alexandra Shipp
